description: In a dark, cavernous environment, likely representing the underworld, a figure resembling the devil stands before several sweating individuals. Behind the devil, a framed sign displays the message, 'Today is the first day of the rest of your life.' The presence of this motivational cliché in the context of eternal damnation creates a stark and ironic contrast. The scene highlights the absurdity of finding optimism in a state of perpetual suffering. The distressed expressions and sweat on the gathered figures emphasize their bleak and inescapable fate.
caption: null

other_text.text: Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
